title: Dress, late 18th–mid-19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert P. Brown
description: Rudimentary garment with drawstrings around neck and chest, made up of pieces of printed cotton with dark brown groun and large-scale windblown flowers and leaves, in red and blue, with traces of yellow.

late 18th–mid-19th century. Medium: cotton
